meanings.definition: The work or mission of an apostle.
meanings.sent1: She dedicated her life to her apostolate, helping those in need.
meanings.sent2: The apostolate of teaching is a noble calling.
meanings.sent3: The apostolate of baking cookies for charity events brought joy to many.
meanings.sent4: His apostolate of kindness spread like wildfire in the community.
meanings.sent5: The apostolate of caring for stray animals touched many hearts.

meanings.definition: The office or authority of an apostle.
meanings.sent1: The apostolate of leadership requires great responsibility.
meanings.sent2: He was honored with the apostolate of overseeing the project.
meanings.sent3: In the apostolate of office supplies, she ruled with a stapler in hand.
meanings.sent4: The apostolate of guidance shone through his every decision.
meanings.sent5: The apostolate of command was evident in the way he carried himself.

meanings.definition: A group of people engaged in spreading a religious message.
meanings.sent1: The apostolate gathered to plan their outreach programs.
meanings.sent2: She joined the apostolate to share her faith with others.
meanings.sent3: The apostolate of singers harmonized their message beautifully.
meanings.sent4: Their apostolate of kindness was felt by all who crossed their path.
meanings.sent5: The apostolate of volunteers worked tirelessly to help the community.
